title: How to Perform a Money Spell

steps.headline: Get your supplies.
steps.description:
A Green Candle (anointed)
A Leaf (Please try to find a suitable one on the ground. Let's not tear up our trees for this). A sharpie.

steps.headline: Use your sharpie to write the exact dollar amount of money that you need onto the leaf.
Place the leaf under the candle.
Focus your intent while you light the candle.
Meditate on your intentions with the candle for at least 10 minutes.
Let your candle burn down or extinguish it.
steps.description: With your fingers or a snuffer please.

steps.headline: Take the leaf outside and bury it.
Enjoy the satisfaction when the universe creates a way for you to have what you want.

tyn: A leaf (brown, green, dry or not)
text:
Get your supplies. A Green Candle (anointed)
A Leaf (Please try to find a suitable one on the ground. Let's not tear up our trees for this). A sharpie. Use your sharpie to write the exact dollar amount of money that you need onto the leaf.  Place the leaf under the candle.  Focus your intent while you light the candle.  Meditate on your intentions with the candle for at least 10 minutes.  Let your candle burn down or extinguish it. With your fingers or a snuffer please. Take the leaf outside and bury it.  Enjoy the satisfaction when the universe creates a way for you to have what you want.
sentences:
A Green Candle (anointed)
A Leaf (Please try to find a suitable one on the ground.
Let's not tear up our trees for this).
Use your sharpie to write the exact dollar amount of money that you need onto the leaf.
Place the leaf under the candle.
Focus your intent while you light the candle.
Meditate on your intentions with the candle for at least 10 minutes.
Let your candle burn down or extinguish it.
With your fingers or a snuffer please.
Take the leaf outside and bury it.
Enjoy the satisfaction when the universe creates a way for you to have what you want.
